title: Alistair's Night
description: All is quiet at 2 a.m., and Alistair the cat is ready to play. Students will enjoy reading about Alistair's clever attempts to wake Dan and Becky. The book provides opportunities for students to develop flexibility with print layout by altering the location of text throughout the book. Humorous illustrations accompany the text.
meta: burglers, dangerous, entertain, lonely, pounce, vase
Use the reading strategy of self-questioning to understand text
Narrative Point of View : Identify narrative point of view
Manipulate Initial Sound : Manipulate initial sounds
Silent Letters : Understand that some consonants are silent and that /n/ may be represented by n or kn
Contractions : Match contractions to their individual words
High-Frequency Words : Identify and define high-frequency word play

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
